feed.title: Note Mark Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Note Mark: V0.12.2
entry.content:
Changes

Changed

  • Prevent app from starting if static directory does not exist, if one has been set

Fixed

  • 195; cannot update user profile

  • 191; attachments cannot be opened

Full Changelog: https://github.com/enchant97/note-mark/compare/v0.12.1...v0.12.2

entry.title: New release for Note Mark: v0.13.0
entry.content:
Changes

Added

  • Data import/export via CLI

Fixed

  • Better styling on mobile in portrait mode

  • 89; Changing tab with unsaved changes causes data-loss

Full Changelog: https://github.com/enchant97/note-mark/compare/v0.12.2...v0.13.0

entry.title: New release for Note Mark: V0.13.1
entry.content:
⛔ Security Fix ⛔

HTML sanitisation was performed in incorrect place (before html content was generated from markdown). Found by: @alessio-romano, read more here: https://github.com/enchant97/note-mark/security/advisories/GHSA-rm48-9mqf-8jc3.

Changes

Fixed

  • fixed XSS vulnerability

Full Changelog: https://github.com/enchant97/note-mark/compare/v0.13.0...v0.13.1

entry.title: New release for Note Mark: v0.14.0
entry.content:
Changes

Added

  • 207; vim mode for editor (thanks to @wuguishifu for the initial code)

Changed

  • Update frontend and docker versions
  • Refactor backend to make a future update easier
  • Require go 1.22 for backend
  • Make cursor easier to see
  • Keep editor settings for current session

Fixed

  • 206; copy to clipboard does not work on all browsers

Full Changelog: https://github.com/enchant97/note-mark/compare/v0.13.1...v0.14.0

entry.title: New release for Note Mark: v0.14.1
